snippet.title: Blasphemous: Stir of Dawn - Update Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
The Blasphemous ‘Stir of Dawn’ Update is Available Now on PlayStation 4!

This free update introduces new features & mechanics, map system, storylines, enemies and a gruelling New Game+ with new ways to slay! Tear your way through forsaken lands afflicted by an ancestral power long forgotten by the Miracle, and face off against the deadly Amanecidas.


Official website: https://thegamekitchen.com/blasphemous/
Follow Blasphemous on Twitter: https://twitter.com/BlasphemousGame
Follow The Game Kitchen on Twitter: https://twitter.com/TheGameKitchen
Follow Team17 on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Team17Ltd
Like Team17 on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Team17/

About Team17 Group plc Founded in 1990, Team17 Group plc is a leading international video games label and creative partner for independent developers. The portfolio comprises over 100 games, including The Escapists, Overcooked, Yoku’s Island Express, Yooka-Laylee, the Worms franchise and many more from developers around the world. Visit www.team17.com for more info

Rated Mature: Violence Blood and Gore Nudity
